results.definition: kiss, embrace, or fondle with sexual passion
examples: The couple were necking in the back seat of the car

results.definition: the part of an organism (human or animal) that connects the head to the rest of the body
examples: he admired her long graceful neck
the horse won by a neck

results.definition: an opening in a garment for the neck of the wearer; a part of the garment near the wearer's neck
a cut of meat from the neck of an animal
a narrow elongated projecting strip of land
a narrow part of an artifact that resembles a neck in position or form
examples: the banjo had a long neck
the bottle had a wide neck
